data.content: g3y1.5.2 complete: Added UNSUPPORTED error code to BackendErrorCode, maps to HTTP 405 in backendErrorStatus(). KnotsBackend.delete() returns UNSUPPORTED instead of INVALID_INPUT. Created /api/capabilities route exposing per-repo capabilities via getBackendCapabilitiesForRepo(). AutoRoutingBackend.capabilitiesForRepo() resolves per-repo. 27 tests in knots-guardrails.test.ts cover all guards. Ref: 0a6e4ab..26712a8
